snippet: Nepal said India imposed an economic blockade as retaliation for its adoption of a Constitution that had drawn Indian objections.
abstract: Newly initiated border policy in India, requiring thorough search of every truck passing into Nepal, has some 400 trucks backed up at customs post in West Bengal State; Nepali officials say policy is economic blockade in retaliation for Nepal's adopting of Constitution over India’s objection that Nepalese population should be consulted more thoroughly.

byline.contributor: Bhadra Sharma contributed reporting from Kathmandu, Nepal.

lead_paragraph: Nepal said India imposed an economic blockade as retaliation for its adoption of a Constitution that had drawn Indian objections.

headline.main: Border Havoc as Nepalis Accuse India of Payback
headline.print_headline: Border Havoc as Nepalis Accuse India of Payback
